185386661.review:
Game 4/365

I thought I would give this game a try as part of a 1 game a day challenge I set myself for the next year.

911 is an alright game with alright graphics. 

You are thrust into the role of a 911 call operator. You have to dispatch police, fire engines and ambulances to incidents around the map. In some cases you take calls and have to go through the dialog making decisions. That really seems to be the extent of the game. It is a top down map driven interface with icons representing the different services. At times you will have more than one call come in and you will have to prioritise which emergencies matter.

I found it entertaining and not too shabby just not sure I will be back to it any time soon.

Graphics 3/5
Gameplay 2/5
Replayability 2/5
Difficulty 2/5

185344663.review: 什么时候出DEI多元化DLC，让内容贴合实际，比如必须配置性少数群体，效率贬低，支出增加，接线员必须严谨地使用人称代词。我绝对不会买

185253962.review: I tentatively recommend this game based on its simple, satisfying gameplay loop. Answer emergency calls, dispatch units to reported incidents and manage your unit availability and resources after a successful day. There is a nice touch of class, allowing cities across the world to be played as unique career scenarios, which does help add some variety. The different situations and unique cataclismic events do also offer a nice change of pace, but essentiality it is the same gameplay loop. It can wear out rather quickly if it isn't your thing and the presentation of the game gives off a more mobile app than full fledged pc product. That said, if you see the game on a sale, I would say it is worth your while.

185186265.review: Very good casual game. Ive had a lot of fun with it.

185121186.review: Worth a night of distraction but has no staying power. Gameplay can be summarised as "ask same four questions then right click on the incident".

185104197.review:
Originally got the game as it seemed interesting and I really liked how it had native Linux support, but then at some point Linux support got abandoned and now only an outdated version of this will run naively forcing those that want to play the newer versions with all the DLCs and bug fixes to have to use a compatibility layer such as Proton/Wine. It does work pretty well with the compatibility layer, but I'm still sad to see native support gone and even more sad to see it gone from future games by this publisher. Hopeful some day it'll make a return, but until then I probably won't be buying any more games from this publisher just on principal.

In terms of gameplay, I found it to be somewhat simplistic, which limits its replay value. It does a decent job of exposing players to the types of situations 911 operators might handle, creating a sense of awareness even if it isn't entirely accurate. Despite this, it's still a solid game for what it aims to achieve and might be worth it when it's on sale.

185100349.review: gioco molto carino ed abbastanza rilassante (non è vero)

184982238.review: Easy enough to understand. Game does get repetitive after awhile.

184974936.review:
I can't recommend this game, I like the gameplay, but the tutorial needs quite a bit of work. I played the tutorial and it gives a very brief common sense how to play, but then it throws you to the wolves. I made it to the third level, but the amount of firefighter missions that they throw at you is just unfeasible. They give you 2 firefighters and give 2 or 3 large fires at a time, each requiring both units. I'm clearly missing something that wasn't told in the tutorial because like, its not feasible to expect that 2 units is able to handle 3 large fires at once, each requiring 800 seconds to complete. Not to mention the tutorial (at least from what I saw) never explained unit health at all, so suddenly you are thinking you have it handled and suddenly you get a "unit down" alert and find out that you can't use that unit for another 6 missions. It's XCOM 2 level health which sucks when it costs 2k to hire someone new. I'm at the state where most of my firefighter units are unable to be used, but I don't have the funds to continue. So I guess it's just game over?

I love the potential, and it was fun up until that point, and I think it definitly drives the point across that the job isn't a great job but someone has to do it. That might have been the intent, and if so they suceeded as I don't really wanna go back for more.

184914983.review: Игра хорошая, но уже устаревшая - не очень удобный интерфейс управления подразделениями, давно не работает загрузка карт любого города в свободной игре, некоторые достижения багованные (15 городов, например). Рекомендую брать 112 от того же разработчика - она сделана лучше и в ней есть все то, что было в 911. Обязательно включайте дополнения к 112!

183729075.review:
911 Operator ist eine interessante Simulations-Erfahrung, bei der du die Rolle eines Notrufdisponenten übernimmst. Dein Ziel ist es, Notrufe entgegenzunehmen und schnell die richtigen Rettungsdienste wie Polizei, Feuerwehr oder Rettungsdienste zu schicken. Das Spiel ist insgesamt sehr realistisch und fordert dich heraus, schnelle und präzise Entscheidungen zu treffen.

Die Spielmechanik ist gut durchdacht – du musst auf eine Vielzahl von Notfällen reagieren, von medizinischen Notfällen bis hin zu Verbrechen und Naturkatastrophen. Das Gefühl der Dringlichkeit wird durch die Zeitlimits und die Vielzahl an gleichzeitigen Einsätzen verstärkt.

Was das Spiel jedoch von einer perfekten Erfahrung entfernt, ist seine Wiederholbarkeit. Manche Szenarien und Aufgaben können mit der Zeit etwas monoton werden, und die Künstliche Intelligenz der Einsatzkräfte ist nicht immer perfekt. Es gibt auch gelegentlich kleinere technische Probleme, die das Spielgefühl trüben können.

Trotz dieser Schwächen bleibt 911 Operator ein solides Spiel für Fans von Simulationsspielen und bietet einen interessanten Einblick in den Alltag eines Notrufdisponenten.

Ich gebe dem Spiel 7/10 – es ist gut und bietet interessante Herausforderungen, könnte aber in einigen Bereichen noch etwas mehr Abwechslung und Feinschliff gebrauchen.

183697207.review: 10/10 разговоров про боль в животе на фоне землетрясения
